titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Repertory Theatre and Yale School of Drama Ephemera Collection
Yale Repertory Theatre and Yale School of Drama Ephemera Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Monica Achen

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 23:01

did.unittitle: Yale Repertory Theatre and Yale School of Drama Ephemera Collection
did.abstract: This collection contains ephemera pertaining to Yale Repertory Theatre, Yale School of Drama, and other undergraduate theater organizations at Yale University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Yale Repertory Theatre and Yale School of Drama Ephemera Collection was housed in the former Drama Library until its transfer to the Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library in 2008.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Repertory Theatre and Yale School of Drama Ephemera Collection, Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library, Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the following ephemeral materials pertaining to Yale Repertory Theatre (YRT) and Yale School of Drama (YSD): theater programs; course catalogues; brochures; posters; student registration lists and directories; rehearsal, production, and course schedules; cast lists; commencement programs; newsletters; clippings; league scenes programs; holiday cards; and materials relating to guest performances sponsored by YRT and YSD. The collection also includes a few items pertaining to the Yale Dramatic Association (also known as the Dramat) and other undergraduate theater organizations and performances.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged chronologically by year, then month and day. Materials with year-only information are filed after items arranged by month and day. Notes have been provided for any folders containing materials other than YRT and YSD ephemera.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 36 includes Dramat programs and a brochure.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 41 includes Dramat materials and a brochure for the Yale Drama Festival. See also a hand-written note to F. Curtis Canfield on verso of one sheet of the production schedule.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 44 includes Dramat and Yale Drama Festival materials.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 48 includes Dramat and Yale Drama Festival materials.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 52 includes Dramat and Yale Drama Festival materials.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 54 includes Dramat and Yale Drama Festival materials.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 57 includes a speech by Robert Brustein given to the School of Drama, minutes from a faculty meeting, and a memo on student discipline. Folder 58 includes materials relating to the cancellation of Sam Shepard's Operation Sidewinder and a Yale Drama Festival brochure.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 63 includes a commencement address by Robert Brustein.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 212 includes a commencement address by Robert Brustein. Folder 214 includes a program and clipping from a Yale undergraduate production.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 217 includes Dramat programs and programs from performances given during the Fourth International Congress on Enlightenment.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 73 includes a letter to patrons regarding cuts to the National Endowment for the Arts (NEA). Folder 74 includes Dramat materials.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 78 includes Dramat programs and an interview with Louise Guay.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 86 includes a Dramat program and a poster for a Yale Theatre Studies department colloquium. See also Box 18 for oversize materials dated 1983-1984.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: See also Box 6 for regularly sized materials dated 1983-1984.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 87 includes a Theatre for the Nuclear Freeze benefit poster. Folder 90 includes materials relating to the Yale Salute to Cole Porter benefit. Folder 91 includes a Dramat poster and materials from Yale undergraduate productions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 94 includes materials relating to the Yale School of Drama 60th Anniversary Celebration. Folder 95 includes Dramat programs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 101 includes materials pertaining to the Yale Repertory Theatre AIDS benefit.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 114 includes materials pertaining to the Lloyd Richards Chair benefit. See also Box 10..

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 125 includes a Dramat program. See also Box 18 for oversize programs for Shooting a Dream and The Duchess of Malfi .

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Folder 199 includes a Dramat program and materials from other Yale undergraduate productions. See also Box 19.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes promotional materials for the 2009-2010 YSD curriculum press releases; 2009-2010 alumni magazine; 2009 Yale Summer Cabaret; 2010 Yale Summer Cabaret; 2009-2010 Yale School of Drama productions; 2009-2010 No Boundaries (WPP); and 2009-2010 Yale Repertory Theatre productions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes promotional materials for the 2010-2011 and 2012-2013 seasons of both the Yale School of Drama and the Yale Repertory Theatre.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes photographs, press releases, flyer, and event programs.

did.unittitle: The Marriage of Figaro / Figaro Gets a Divorce

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes flyers and photographs for Marriage of Figaro / Figaro Gets a Divorce; Postcarsds for The Good Person of Szechwan.
